page.title: 18PRINCIPLE FEATURES
page.content: ......continued The linear shopping area around the Green Man is another feature.The shops are a local attraction and make the area very busy during trading hours: roads are narrowed by parked cars, particularly the Deans Lane road for 100-150 metres south of the junction. The motorway(M1) passes through the north-east corner of the grid square on its way into and out of London:the arterial road of the A41 running roughly west- east passes through the northern part of the square : both contribute to the noise level in thier immediate areas and to the pollution.
